unnormalised: Arre bhai, pesticide usage is a big issue! My Kaka in Punjab lost half his crop on 20/10/2023 due to pests. He said the R.S. Puram Agriculture University guys suggested something new, but it's costly. Heard some farmers are protesting near Delhi on 15/01/2024 at 14:00 hrs. Hope things get better for everyone by Diwali 01/11/2024. Jai Kisan!
normalised: Arre bhai, pesticide usage is a big issue! My Kaka in Punjab lost half his crop on twentieth october two thousand and twenty three due to pests. He said the R S Puram Agriculture University guys suggested something new, but it's costly. Heard some farmers are protesting near Delhi on fifteenth january two thousand and twenty four at two P M. Hope things get better for everyone by Diwali first november two thousand and twenty four. Jai Kisan!
